dc_title_s: Marine Protected Areas, Channel Islands, California, 2004
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents the Channel Islands Marine Protected Areas. Pending Office of Administrative Law approval MPAs in effect as of April 9, 2003. This layer is part of a collection of data created by the California Department of Fish and Game. This shapefile was prepared to make web and hardcopy documents for public distribution of the Channel Island Marine Protected Areas. This map should not be used for navigational purposes. California Department of Fish and Game. Marine Resources Region. (2004). Marine Protected Areas, Channel Islands, California, 2004. California Department of Fish and Game. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/zc305gv0300. Futhermore, the restrictions described are only those imposed by this MPA designation. Additional restrictions may apply to fishing activites and other activities such as collecting, discharging and disposing of substances. Refer to the CA Code of Regulations, Title 14 ยง632 and the Code of Federal Regulations, Title 15 ยง922.70 or contact the CA Department of Fish and Game or the Channel Islands National Marine Sanctuary. For further information on the Channel Islands Marine Protected Areas please visit the following websites: http://www.dfg.ca.gov/mrd/channel_islands/index.html http://www.dfg.ca.gov/mrd/channel_islands/flyer.pdf This file is not for navigational purposes. This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
